thread.title: BRIEF-Ampliphi Biosciences Announces Registered Direct Offering Of Common Stock

title: BRIEF-Ampliphi Biosciences Announces Registered Direct Offering Of Common Stock

organizations.name: irect offering of common stock reuters

text: March 20, 2018 / 12:14 PM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-Ampliphi Biosciences Announces Registered Direct Offering Of Common Stock Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Ampliphi Biosciences Corp: * AMPLIPHI BIOSCIENCES ANNOUNCES REGISTERED DIRECT OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK * AMPLIPHI BIOSCIENCES ANNOUNCES REGISTERED DIRECT OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK * AMPLIPHI BIOSCIENCES CORP - OFFERING 2.7 MILLION SHARES OF ITS STOCK AT A PRICE OF $1.10 PER SHAREâ€‹ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
